headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Lam Research (LRCX) After Its 183% One Year Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether Lam Research still offers good value after a strong run, or whether the price may now be stretched, this article will walk you through what the numbers are really saying about the stock. The share price last closed at US$231.01, with a return of a 1% decline over the last 7 days, 5.8% over 30 days, 24.8% year to date and 183.2% over the past year, plus 372.0% over 3 years and 316.2% over 5 years. Recent attention on Lam Research has focused on its role in the...

headline: Citi Remains Bullish on KLA (KLAC) Amid Persistent Phase 2 Upcycle in Wafer Fab Equipment and Potential Upside
summary: KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) is one of the 13 Best Extremely Profitable Stocks to Invest in Now. On January 30, 2026, KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) attracted increased attention from analysts when Citi increased its price target from $1,450 to $1,800 while reiterating a ‘Buy’ rating.
